law.catch_line: In allocating receipts and disbursements to or between principal and income, and with respect to any...

text.section: In exercising a discretionary power of administration regarding a matter within the scope of this subtitle, whether granted by the terms of a trust, a will, or this subtitle, a fiduciary shall administer a trust or estate impartially, based on what is fair and reasonable to all of the beneficiaries, except to the extent that the terms of the trust or the will clearly manifest an intention that the fiduciary shall or may favor one or more of the beneficiaries. A determination in accordance with this subtitle is presumed to be fair and reasonable to all of the beneficiaries.
